name: Heavy Weapons Blinking
description: After doing and playing in YDDMT.WAD, I decided that I want to make a deathmatch level with safe starts (like MAP21 in YDDMT.WAD) and powerful weapons and 200%, so that we'll have a tough deathmatch (BFG9000 in the beginning!). The main area has much ammo for the new deathmatch (with items respawn)
